summary: "Great Expectations" is a famous novel by Charles Dickens, telling the story of an orphan named Pip. It's set in the 1800s in England and follows Pip's life as he grows up, facing challenges like poverty and meeting interesting characters like the mysterious Miss Havisham. The book was first published in parts, and people loved it. It's full of exciting scenes and teaches lessons about wealth, love, and good versus evil. Even today, it's still popular and has been made into movies and TV shows.
title: Great Expectations
